mapper.select: select pc.pcategory,pname,ptype ,description ,calorie ,fat ,sugars ,sodium ,caffeine ,imagefile ,pc.registdate , pid ,temperature ,capacity ,price ,onsale from tbl_product_category pc join tbl_product p on pc.pcategory=p.pcategory where pid =#{pid}
select pc.* from tbl_product_category pc where pc.ptype = #{ptype} and exists (select 1 from tbl_product p where p.pcategory = pc.pcategory and onsale = 1)

select p.pid, p.pcategory, p.temperature, ct.disp temperatureDisp, p.capacity, cc.disp capacityDisp, p.price, p.onsale from tbl_product p inner join tbl_codes ct ON ct.code = p.temperature AND ct.type = 'TEMPER' left join tbl_codes cc ON cc.code = p.capacity AND cc.type = 'DRINK' where p.pcategory = #{category} and p.onsale = 1 order by p.temperature, p.capacity
